project.title: AHI Capstone 2026 Delivery
project.description: Real-Time PEME Monitoring and Result Access System: sprint execution board

milestones.title: Sprint 01 (Mar 1 - Mar 14)
milestones.description: Bootstrap repository, environment setup, Supabase project creation

milestones.title: Sprint 03 (Mar 29 - Apr 11)
milestones.description: Frontend foundation, CI/CD, auth flow validation

milestones.title: Sprint 11 (Aug 9 - Aug 29)
milestones.description: Performance optimization, compliance evidence, deployment prep

issues.title: [Epic] Iteration 1: Cloud Infrastructure & Foundation
issues.body:
Objective: Establish deployable baseline with Supabase, Next.js, auth, and CI/CD.

Acceptance criteria:
- Supabase project configured with environment secrets
- Initial schema and auth tables available
- Next.js app deployed to preview/production environment
- Staff/patient/agency login entry points reachable

issues.title: [Story] Initialize Next.js + Tailwind workspace
issues.body:
Create baseline application shell for dashboards and portals.

Acceptance criteria:
- Next.js TypeScript project scaffolded
- Tailwind configured with responsive breakpoints
- Base layout and route groups added

issues.title: [Story] Provision Supabase project and secrets
issues.body:
Provision cloud project and connect application environments.

Acceptance criteria:
- Supabase project created and reachable
- ENV variables documented in repository secrets
- Connectivity test succeeds from local and hosted app

issues.title: [Story] Create core schema migrations (12 tables)
issues.body:
Implement canonical schema from capstone design-doc.

Acceptance criteria:
- All 12 tables created with constraints
- UUID PK strategy applied to PATIENT and PEME_CASE
- Required indexes created for queue/performance paths

issues.title: [Story] Implement RBAC and RLS policies for 8 roles
issues.body:
Apply role-aware data isolation at DB layer.

Acceptance criteria:
- RLS enabled on sensitive tables
- Policies restrict reads/writes by role boundaries
- Policy tests pass for all actor profiles

issues.title: [Story] Build unified login surfaces (Staff, Patient, Agency)
issues.body:
Deliver role-appropriate authentication entry points.

Acceptance criteria:
- Staff login supports email/password
- Patient login supports Case ID + DOB flow
- Agency login supports authorized credential flow

issues.title: [Story] Configure CI/CD to Vercel with branch previews
issues.body:
Automate deploy pipeline for stable iteration delivery.

Acceptance criteria:
- PR preview deploys enabled
- Main branch auto-deploy enabled
- Build failures surface in checks

issues.title: [Epic] Iteration 2: Active Encoding & Real-Time Dashboards
issues.body: Objective: Complete internal PEME workflow from registration to release with live status visibility.

issues.title: [Story] Reception/Billing queue and case creation
issues.body: Implement patient lookup, company/package linkage, and case initiation.

issues.title: [Story] Triage dashboard and vital signs encoding
issues.body: Implement triage queue controls and clinical data capture form.

issues.title: [Story] Department staff work queues and result entry
issues.body: Enable department-level waiting/called/in-service/completed transitions and result item encoding.

issues.title: [Story] Physician case review and fit/unfit decision
issues.body: Provide consolidated case summary, notes, and decision finalization workflow.

issues.title: [Story] Releasing station final checklist and release action
issues.body: Implement release gating against visit completion and physician decision readiness.

issues.title: [Story] Admin master data management (users, departments, packages)
issues.body: Provide configuration interfaces and access management controls for admins.

issues.title: [Story] Implement realtime subscriptions for queue updates
issues.body: Stream DEPARTMENT_VISIT and PEME_CASE status transitions to role dashboards in near real time.

issues.title: [Story] End-to-end case lifecycle testing
issues.body: Validate complete workflow from registration to release with role-based checks and audit trails.

issues.title: [Epic] Iteration 3: Patient & Agency Portals
issues.body: Objective: Deliver secure external access for patient and agency result visibility and downloads.

issues.title: [Story] Patient portal progress tracker and released results view
issues.body: Implement mobile-first status tracker and released result access for patients.

issues.title: [Story] Agency portal search and consolidated access
issues.body: Provide agency-side lookup and summary view for authorized candidate results.

issues.title: [Story] Email notification pipeline on release
issues.body: Send release notifications via SMTP/TLS to patients, agencies, and designated staff.

issues.title: [Story] PDF certificate generation and download
issues.body: Generate standardized certificate PDFs and transmittal summaries for released cases.

issues.title: [Story] Security hardening and vulnerability remediation
issues.body: Run OWASP-style checks and remediate critical/high findings before deployment readiness.

issues.title: [Epic] Iteration 4: Validation, Deployment, and Handover
issues.body: Objective: Achieve performance, compliance, documentation, training, and capstone closeout targets.

issues.title: [Story] Performance optimization against target SLAs
issues.body: Tune dashboards, queues, portal loading, and PDF generation to meet response time targets.

issues.title: [Story] Compliance evidence package (RA 10173, ISO, DOH)
issues.body: Compile controls, logs, and checklists required for privacy and quality compliance review.

issues.title: [Story] Production deployment readiness and rollback plan
issues.body: Prepare production runbook, rollback strategy, and monitoring alerts for go-live.

issues.title: [Story] User manuals and training materials by role
issues.body: Produce role-specific manuals, quick guides, and training references for handover.

issues.title: [Story] Conduct staff and stakeholder training sessions
issues.body: Deliver onboarding sessions and collect readiness feedback for operational use.

issues.title: [Story] Baseline vs post-implementation evaluation dataset
issues.body: Capture operational metrics and SUS/interview data required for capstone evaluation.

issues.title: [Story] Final acceptance, defense package, and closeout
issues.body: Complete final verification, archive deliverables, and prepare panel presentation materials.

issues.title: [Task] Submit deployment authorization request (4-6 week lead)
issues.body: Open formal deployment authorization request to satisfy required lead-time before production release.

issues.title: [Task] Establish risk register and sprint risk review ritual
issues.body: Track clinic schedule, connectivity, participation, and integration risks with mitigation owners.
